resources.string: Welcome to Pebble Connect with httpebble support, this app allows your Pebble smart watch to communicate with the Internet, access your location, store data and receive notifications. This app does not need to be open or running to be used by your Pebble.
If you would like to get notifications or use IFTTT with your Pebble, visit the Cloud Access section
Further information and support can be found in the Pebble forums.
The source code can be found on GitHub.

Cloud Access allows your Pebble to receive notifications and data from the Internet. Your Pebble can be used as a channel on If This Then That or you can use the API to integrate with just about anything else. For more information please see the documentation. To use the ifttt channel, you must enable the Wordpress channel with ofkorth.net/pebble as the domain, your user id as the username and user token as the password. When creating an ifttt recipe, you should select the Wordpress create a post option. The text you enter for the title will appear as the title in the notification on your Pebble and the text entered for the body will appear as the body of the notification on your Pebble. Categories and tags can be left blank and select publish immediately.

These are your user id and user tokens, they are used to send data to your Pebble. You can make up anything to use as your user id and token, please choose something unique for your user id such as your email. Anyone with your id and token can send data to your Pebble, so keep them safe. Changing your token at anytime will invalidate you previous token and not allow it to send data to your Pebble.
